TopicTitle: A look at the new features in the upcoming Blender release

Articles.Content: Pretty cool stuff; here\'s hoping all of the nGon conversions don\'t break the DAE exporter

I am really excited now.

I\'ve been wanting these features for quite some time (especially the working knife tool and face dissolving)

This is purely a modeling feature though, at the end of the day, Unity will convert your object to triangles, like this.

I do all my stuff in quads, unless I need tris, but I\'m just too much of a control freak to trust NGon conversion. That knife tool I\'ve been sorely missing though. I could have sworn Blender already had that years ago, but half of the really useful stuff seems to have disappeared when it went all professional.
